articles.title: Former SpaceX exec says Blue Origin's lawsuit over NASA choosing SpaceX for a $2.9 billion contract looks 'desperate' - Yahoo News
articles.description: Hans Koenigsmann told Insider he doesn't think there's anything Elon Musk's SpaceX needs to beat Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin at.
articles.content:
Jeff Bezos' space company, Blue Origin, looks "desperate" for taking legal action with NASA over SpaceX, a former vice president of Elon Musk's space company told Insider.

articles.title: Novavax Cranks It Up: A Billion More Doses, Covid Authorization And Much More - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: The Serum Institute is expanding its Novavax production capacity by a billion doses. Novavax is buying these on a per dose basis, so it keeps all of the profits. Read more here.
